content: cute stripey dungarees knit in easy-to-wash cotton for a cool summer outfit or substitute the cotton yarn for wool for a cosier set for winter these are roomy enough for cloth nappies with poppered legs for easy nappy changes a folded hem and i-cord edging gives it a neat finish disclaimer i have only tested the pattern in the first 3 sizes so yarn requirements for the larger sizes are only an estimate updated 25 april 2021
